Class Emotions

  • Object
    • Emotions

  • public class Emotions
extends Object
    Author:
    Stefano Cascavilla

    It describes an emotion object

    • Method Detail

      • numeroOccorrenze

        public HashMap<Character,Integer> numeroOccorrenze()
        Returns:
        It returns an HashMap which has five keys (each one identifies a specific emotion), each of these has attached the correct number of occurrences

      • increase

        public void increase(char emotion)
        It looks for the specified emotion and increases the number of occurrences related. If the emotion is invalid, it throws an exception
        Parameters:
        emotion - It identifies the emotion char
